curPatternObj.1: Ready Posture: Parallel Stance with a Heaven Hand
curPatternObj.2: Step 1. Move the left foot to B, forming a right L-stance toward B while executing a middle guarding block to B with the forearm.
curPatternObj.3: Step 2. Pull the right foot to the left knee joint to form a left one-leg stance toward D, at the same time lifting both fists while turning the face toward A.
curPatternObj.4: Step 3. Execute a pressing kick to A with the right foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 2.
curPatternObj.5: Step 4. Lower the right foot to A to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a middle side strike to A with the right knife-hand.
curPatternObj.6: Step 5. Execute an angle punch with the left fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.7: Step 6. Execute a pressing block with the left, fore fist while executing a side front block with the right inner forearm, maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.8: Step 7. Execute a pressing block with the right fore fist and a side front block with the left inner forearm while maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.9: Step 8. Execute a middle wedging block with the inner forearm while maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.10: Step 9. Thrust to C with the right back elbow supporting the right fore fist with the left palm keeping the face as it was in 8 while maintaining a sitting stance towards D.
curPatternObj.11: Step 10. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist slipping the left palm up to the right elbow joint while maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.12: Step 11. Thrust to C with the left back elbow supporting the left fore fist with right palm, keeping the face as it was in 10 while maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.13: Step 12. Execute a right horizontal punch to A while maintaining a sitting stance toward D. Perform 6 through 12 in a continuous motion.
curPatternObj.14: Step 13. Cross the left foot over the right foot forming a right X-stance toward D while executing a low front block to D with the right outer forearm and bringing the left finger belly on the right under forearm.
curPatternObj.15: Step 14. Move the right foot to A forming a left L-stance toward A at the same time executing a U-shape grasp to A.
curPatternObj.16: Step 15. Bring the left foot to the right foot forming a closed stance toward D while executing a horizontal thrust with a twin elbow, turning the face toward B. Perform in slow motion.
curPatternObj.17: Step 16. Move the left foot to B to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a side back strike to C with the right back fist and extending the left arm to the side downward.
curPatternObj.18: Step 17. Cross the right foot over the left foot forming a left X-stance toward D while executing a low front block with the left outer forearm and bringing the right finger belly to the left side fist.
curPatternObj.19: Step 18. Move the left foot to B to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a low guarding block to B with a reverse knife-hand.
curPatternObj.20: Step 19. Execute a forearm middle guarding block to A while forming a left L-stance toward A pivoting with left foot.
curPatternObj.21: Step 20. Pull the left foot to the right knee joint to form a right one-leg stance toward D, at the same time lifting both fists while turning the face toward B.
curPatternObj.22: Step 21. Execute a pressing kick to B with the left foot keeping the position of the hands as they were in 20.
curPatternObj.23: Step 22. Lower the left foot to B to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a middle side strike to B with the left knife-hand.
curPatternObj.24: Step 23. Execute an angle punch with the right fist while maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.25: Step 24. Execute a pressing block with the right, fore fist while executing a side front block with the left inner forearm, maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.26: Step 25. Execute a pressing block with the left fore fist and a side front block with the right inner forearm while maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.27: Step 26. Execute a middle wedging block with the inner forearm while maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.28: Step 27. Thrust to C with the left back elbow supporting the left fore fist with the right palm keeping the face as it was in 26 while maintaining a sitting stance towards D.
curPatternObj.29: Step 28. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist slipping the right palm up to the left elbow joint while maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.30: Step 29. Thrust to C with the right back elbow supporting the right fore fist with left palm, keeping the face as it was in 28 while maintaining a sitting stance toward D.
curPatternObj.31: Step 30. Execute a left horizontal punch to B while maintaining a sitting stance toward D. Perform 24 through 30 in a continuous motion.
curPatternObj.32: Step 31. Cross the right foot over the left foot forming a left X-stance toward D while executing a low front block to D with the left outer forearm and bringing the right finger belly on the left under forearm.
curPatternObj.33: Step 32. Move the left foot to B forming a right L-stance toward B at the same time executing a U-shape grasp to B.
curPatternObj.34: Step 33. Bring the right foot to the left foot forming a closed stance toward D while executing a horizontal thrust with a twin elbow, turning the face toward A. Perform in slow motion.
curPatternObj.35: Step 34. Move the right foot to A to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a side back strike to C with the left back fist and extending the right arm to the side downward.
curPatternObj.36: Step 35. Cross the left foot over the right foot forming a right X-stance toward D while executing a low front block with the right outer forearm and bringing the left finger belly to the right side fist.
curPatternObj.37: Step 36. Move the right foot to A to form a sitting stance toward D while executing a low guarding block to A with a reverse knife-hand.
curPatternObj.38: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
curPatternObj.title: Po-EunEdit
